General.Name: Techcential International Ltd
General.Description: Techcential International Ltd manufactures and sells American wooden bedroom furniture products worldwide. The company offers five-piece bedroom furniture. It also engages in the manufacturing and sale wooden kitchen cabinets, such as doors, frames, drawer heads, drawer surfaces, and cabinet bodies; and processing and manufacturing of rubber wood raw materials. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Muar, Malaysia.

3.Name: Mr. Kai Jian Eng
3.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Techcential Sdn Bhd (TC)
